goals__remit:
B2EU is a Brussels based consulting firm specialized in EU Funding, Public Affairs and Advocacy situated in the heart of the European Union, where all the important decisions are being made. We are a team of experienced and skilled professionals located in Brussels, Berlin, London, Barcelona, Warsaw, Zagreb, Belgrade and Athens. Needless to mention, B2EU Consulting is a firm committed to highest professional practices and we are equal opportunity employer. B2EU Consulting is registered in the EU Transparency Register. For more information don't hesitate to contact us (info@b2eu-consulting.com) and visit our website. 
B2EU Consulting is assisting clients in following domains: 
- EU Funding 
- Advocacy and Public Affairs 
- Training 
- Event Management
